DOC.brief_summary: Evaluation optimal dose efficacy reduction intraocular pressure safety PHP-201 ophthalmic solution patient normal tension glaucoma
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation PHP-201 Ophthalmic Solution Patients With Normal Tension Glaucoma
DOC.detailed_description: Data collection ( electronic case report form ) , Data dictionary ( MedDRA )
DOC.criteria: 19 year old , female male IOP ≤21 mmHg Subject show open angle finding , glaucomatous optic nerve damage visual field defect BCVA ≥+0.2 Subject disease surgery history eligible participate ( acute close angle glaucoma , narrow angle glaucoma , advance glaucomatous loss , ocular trauma , eye surgery laser surgery , unstable angina , myocardial infarction , uncontrolled hypertension diabetes , etc ) Subject ca n't discontinue contact lens Subject ca n't discontinue topical/systemic IOP lower medication
